statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT product_id, category_id FROM products WHERE price < 50.00
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category_id = 3 AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, category_id FROM products WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, supplier_id, price FROM products WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY supplier_id, price ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses
SELECT warehouse_id, capacity FROM warehouses ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE price < 50
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY warehouse_id
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products INNER JOIN warehouses ON products.product_id = warehouses.warehouse_id
SELECT * FROM warehouse
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouse
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name FROM warehouse ORDER BY warehouse_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM product ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT * FROM warehouse WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouse ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;

SELECT warehouse_name, location, product_name, quantity FROM warehouse w JOIN inventory i ON w.warehouse_id = i.warehouse_id JOIN product p ON i.product_id = p.product_id WHERE w.location = 'Downtown' ORDER BY warehouse_name, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, location_id FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50 AND location_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY location_id, quantity DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT p.product_name, i.quantity, l.location_name FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN locations l ON i.location_id = l.location_id WHERE p.quantity > 0 AND i.quantity > 10 ORDER BY l.location_name ASC, i.quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT warehouse_id, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT warehouse_id, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY location DESC;

SELECT o.order_id, o.customer_name, p.name AS product_name, i.quantity AS order_quantity FROM orders o JOIN transactions t ON o.order_id = t.order_id JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id JOIN inventory i ON t.product_id = i.product_id AND t.order_id = i.warehouse_id WHERE o.status = 'Delivered';

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.timestamp, p.name AS product_name, t.quantity, w.location FROM transactions t JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id JOIN warehouses w ON t.product_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE t.quantity > 10 ORDER BY t.timestamp DESC;
